bitcoin: error: bitcoin: error: expected command but got "bad"

usage: bitcoin [<flags>] <command> [<args> ...]

A command-line Bitcoin application.

Flags:
  --help  Show context-sensitive help (also try --help-long and --help-man).

Commands:
  help [<command>...]
    Show help.

  price [<flags>]
    Output the current price of Bitcoin in USD.
